channel.title: Making the Most of NetBeans
channel.description: A selection of articles and tutorials from netbeans.org, opensource IDE and application backplane

item.title: Build with NetBeans IDE, Deploy to Oracle Java Cloud Service
item.description: Save time and effort deploying applications. Learn to set up Oracle Java Cloud Service, then install and use the Oracle Cloud plugin in the NetBeans IDE.

item.title: Build a Rich Client Platform To-Do Application in NetBeans IDE
item.description: Practice using NetBeans IDE features that improve code quality and increase developer productivity.

item.title: Video: Installing and Using Java ME SDK 8.0 Plugins in NetBeans IDE
item.description: This screencast demonstrates installation and usage of Oracle Java ME SDK 8.0 Plugins in NetBeans IDE on the Windows operating system.

item.title: Using Oracle Java SE Embedded Support in NetBeans IDE
item.description: Get started with Java SE Embedded in NetBeans IDE and learn to use the IDE's support for Java SE Embedded.
